title: How can one replace bitmap (image) inside exe?
content:
I have an application (something like a text editor) that has a background image. 
I understand how to replace text in exe file, but what about image? 
I wonder how difficult and what is the way to replace such image using etc ollydbg, IDA?

comments.text: There are Several ready made resource editors for example look for Resource hacker byagnus johnson
I see I can modify the icon of the executable, but no more than that.
Yes, it is a Windows executable. It is also linked to bunch of dlls.
I understand it is quite a difficult task and I will not get a straight-forward solution. Just theoretically, if you had to do this, how would you go about doing it?
